verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Oh, there’s Honey in the Rock,
my brother,….
There’s Honey in the Rock
for you;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Leave your sins for the blood
to cover,
There’s Honey in the Rock for you.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
O my brother,
do you know the Savior,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Who is wondrous kind and true?
He’s the “Rock of your salvation!”
There’s Honey in the Rock for you.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Have you “tasted
that the Lord is gracious?”
Do you walk in the way
that’s new?

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Have you drunk
from the living fountain?
There’s Honey in the Rock for you.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Do you pray unto God the Father,
“What wilt Thou have me to do?”

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Never fear, He will surely answer,
There’s Honey in the Rock for you.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Then go out thro’
the streets and by ways,
Preach the word
to the many or few;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Say to every fallen brother ,
There’s Honey in the Rock for you.
